In England, in the seven days to 31 December, there were 36,605 new confirmed cases (64.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 December, there were 43,267 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 15% (6,662 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 05 January is 20,465,614 (36,199 cases per 100,000 population).
